Notes: Denver Public Schools announces a 3-week closure, the first large Colorado school district to do so
Gov. Jared Polis issues an executive order suspending all downhill skiing operations
Gov. Jared Polis orders Colorado bars, restaurants closed
Colorado orders all schools closed from March 23 to April 17
Gov. Jared Polis suspends all nonessential medical procedures in Colorado
Denver houses of worship go online
Stay at home order for Denver
Mayor reverses order for closure of liquor stores and dispensaries
All Coloradans should wear non-medical masks when they leave the house, Gov. Jared Polis says
Cargill meatpacking plant in Fort Morgan scales back operations after 1 coronavirus death, as many as 18 cases
Gov. Jared Polis orders essential workers to wear masks, directs more oversight over Colorado’s senior care facilities
Stay at Home order lifted. Colorado retailers can open for curbside pickup Monday, new executive order says as stay-at-home expires.
Leprino Foods to partially reopen Fort Morgan cheese plant after workers tested positive for coronavirus
Denver Mayor Hancock orders face masks to be worn in public places
Colorado hair stylists get back to work
Denver businesses can begin reopening Saturday following state guidelines
Colorado drive-in movie theaters are officially back on for our socially distant summer
Colorado restaurants can resume in-person dining starting this week, governor says
Colorado churches, gyms, pools can reopen at reduced capacities
Colorado bars can reopen this weekend for up to 50 people
Gov. Jared Polis closes Colorado bars again after coronavirus cases increase
In an effort to slow the spread of coronavirus, Polis announces 10 p.m. last call for alcohol statewide.
Colorado Gov. Jared Polis updates last call rules, extends safer-at-home order

A new public order from Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment goes into effect: Limits gatherings to no more than 10 people from no more than two households for counties in the blue (cautious), yellow (concern) and orange levels (high risk) and prohibits gatherings for those in the red level… etc
